full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle,

Thanks for the heads-up!

Just confirming that I’ve removed the bold formatting from “three platters”, now only the names are bold, as requested. You can take a look here to double-check: Seafood Platters Menu.

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like tweaked, always happy to help!

Thank you very much

Can you please remove the bold here 'three platters' only the names should be bold, thanks !



Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director

https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo



7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

michelle@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

please think of the environment before you print this email

New Private Dining Room

Savour love.fish in style!

Our new Private Dining Room offers an intimate harbour escape for up to 16 guests. Relish fresh local seafood, from succulent crab to buttery barramundi, paired with stunning waterfront views. Perfect for birthdays, corporate events, or special celebrations. Customise your menu, sip curated wines, and let our dedicated team make your event unforgettable. Book now for exclusive dining that hooks every moment!



Celebrate the End of the Financial Year 2025 and book your function with us.

With direct Sydney harbour views, our Barangaroo restaurant can host lunch and dinner events, accommodating parties from 8 to 125 guests outside and 28 guests inside.

Group catering for corporate bookings costs $85 for two courses, $89 for three courses or $99 for a full selection menu. We also offer 2-3 hour

drinks packages starting from $69.

View our functions pack here to see why love.fish is the perfect venue for your EOFY event!

Or for any group reservations of 10 guests and more, please contact our team bookings@lovefish.com.au for more information.

Hi Michelle,

Thank you so much for letting me know
  • I've updated the header text on all menu landing pages so it's now uniform—all caps across the board, including the new platter page.
  • The platter page has been added here as requested:
    • Drink Menu
    • Header
  • I’ve also removed the old platter embed that was lingering, should be all tidy now.

Let me know if there’s anything else you'd like adjusted, always happy to help!

• I've noticed the menu landing pages are all a little different. Please make the copy on header photo uniform so all capitals please, including new platter page. See screenshots
  • Yes please the platter page needs to be added here and here
You have left the old platter embedded - please delete Michelle Grand-Milkovic. Founding Director https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo 7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700 michelle@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/ please think of the environment before you print this email New Private Dining Room Savour love.fish in style! View our functions pack here to see why love.fish is the perfect venue for your EOFY event! Or for any group reservations of 10 guests and more, please contact our team bookings@lovefish.com.au for more information.

Hi Michelle,

Thank you so much for letting us know

Just a quick update, we’ve published the changes on our end:
  • The new Seafood Platters page is now live with your copy, images, and all three platter listings
    → lovefish.com.au/seafood-platters-menu
  • The “Favourites” header has been restored between Curry and Lobster Pie, thanks for the heads-up
  • On the Eat Menu page, we’ve added a new Seafood Platters tab for easier access
    → lovefish.com.au/eat-menu

Quick clarification:
  • When you mentioned adding the Seafood Platters page to the dropdown under "$28 Lunch", did you mean you’d like it to appear as a submenu item? or a tab?
  • And would you like the updated menu PDF added to the Eat Menu page, or is it fine where it is on the Platters page?

Let us know what works best, we’ll jump on it!

Amazing thanks

Also I noticed the header has been deleted here where the gap is between curry and lobster pie

Please re add 'favourites' as per the header tabs



Michelle Grand-Milkovic Founding Director

https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo



7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700

michelle@lovefish.com.au http://lovefish.com.au/

Hi Michelle,

Thanks for sending everything through, we’re on it.

Here’s what we’ll be updating:
  • Embedded menu on your Eat page, now featuring the dedicated platter section (page 2)
  • New “Seafood Platters” tab added to the top menu
  • Brand new “love.fish Seafood Platters” page, including:
    • The copy you shared
    • The three platters listed as per the updated menu
    • Header and body images you provided
  • Dropdown menu update to include this new page under “$28 Lunch”

We’ll let you know once everything’s live. If we have any questions along the way, we’ll reach out.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
https://www.lovefish.com.au/eat-menu/


Hi,


Can you please update this menu on our eat page.
We now have a dedicated platter menu (page 2)
So can you please aslo upadte the embedded menu items with our new platters.
We will need a designated tab in the top sections also.


I would also like a new designated 'love.fish Seafood Platters page'
I will attach the photos for the header and the body of page.
Plus put in drop down menu under $28 lunch


Copy is


'Dive into a sea of flavours with our New Seafood Platters!

There's no better way to celebrate seafood than with a classic platter, and we're thrilled to introduce three new ones to our menu!

Introducing The Tower, The Harbourside, and The Classic Fritto Misto-three platters that bring the ocean to your table. Whether you're a seafood connoisseur or just love a good catch, we've got a platter for every palate. So, bring your friends, bring your family, and let's make some memories! Seafood is for sharing, and sharing is for love.fish.

Which platter will you dive into first? 🐟😋'


We can then list the 3 platters as per the menu


Thanks




Michelle Grand-Milkovic
 Founding Director
https://linktr.ee/lovefishbarangaroo

7/23 Barangaroo Avenue, Barangaroo, NSW 2000 P 8077 3700
michelle@lovefish.com.au lovefish.com.au
please think of the environment before you print this email
